title: Black Onyx Adjustable Spiral Midi Knuckle / Toe Ring - 925 Sterling Silver Ring - Delicate BOHO Chic Jewelry - Fashionable and Stylish for Girls and Women with Velvet Gift Bag / Box - Made by Indian Artisans - By Koral Jewelry
features: THE REAL THING - Koral Jewelry brings you jewelry made of only the very best materials that won’t tarnish. This gorgeous and timeless ring is made from 925 sterling silver and genuine black onyx in a bezel setting. The ring can weigh anywhere between 0.7-0.8 grams depending on the size ring. Dimensions: 0.4*0.25 inches

EACH RING IS UNIQUE - Due to the variations of color in the natural black onyx gemstone, each stone is different. Each gem is which appear completely randomly in nature. Classic silver, a simple style and a stone which seems to glow from beneath the surface, makes this a ring which is perfect to wear at any time and on any occasion.

MADE TO LAST - Made by Artisans in India, each ring is crafted with sterling silver to make it sturdy and long-lasting. We want you to be able to treasure this vintage bohemian style ring and even hand it down through generations.

AN AMAZING GIFT for someone you care for. Wife, mother, daughter, sister, aunt or friend - any woman or girl will appreciate this fabulous gift as a birthday, anniversary, holiday or “just because” present. Valentine’s Day will be here before you know it so make someone you love happy!

BUY YOURS NOW and enjoy wearing or giving this delicately attractive piece of real jewelry. At Koral Jewelry we value our customers and their satisfaction is our priority. Please feel free to contact us with any questions or issues that may arise with this purchase. Our customer service team is always available to you.
description: KORAL JEWELRY WHERE OUR CUSTOMERS ARE THE JEWELS IN OUR CROWN

At Koral Jewelry we make it our business to bring our customers the most stunning adornments. We use only the very best materials of exceptional quality such as the 925 sterling silver and gems which are in these rings to ensure that you receive jewelry which you will be proud to wear.
At the same time, we make our jewelry affordable. We believe that you should be able to have as much jewelry as you like without compromising on quality and genuine materials.
A RING WHICH DRAWS THE EYE TO IT

As light enters the gem stone, it is refracted and scattered, producing an extremely unique and attractive play of both color and light which automatically draws the eye to it. You’ll find yourself mesmerized by the stone as it changes in natural daylight and the artificial light of the evening.
That is the way we would describe this piece. It is elegance itself while being still suitable for daywear or evening wear.
The perfect gift for your favorite lady whether she’s your wife, your mother, your sister, your daughter or your friend.
A beautiful graduation gift, Valentine’s Day gift, Mother’s Day, Christmas gift, anniversary, birthday gift and so much more.
The ring comes in a beautiful velvet presentation bag/ gift box

A FEW LITTLE CARE TIPS Keep your silver jewelry looking its best: * Do not wear while cleaning * Do not expose to harsh chemicals * Do not wear in the pool or spa * Store your jewelry individually to prevent scratching * Anti-tarnish strips are perfect to keep the silver looking sparkling clean
for yourself or as a gift because we at Koral Jewelry are ALWAYS HERE FOR YOU.
